English[edit]

Phrase[edit]

ihn

  1. (Internet, text messaging) Initialism of I hope not.

Anagrams[edit]

  • NIH, hin

German[edit]

Pronunciation[edit]

  • (standard) IPA(key): /iːn/
  • audio
    		(file)
  • Rhymes: -iːn
  • (colloquially in unstressed position) IPA(key): /ən/

Pronoun[edit]

ihn

  1. (personal) accusative of er; him (direct object).
  2. (personal) (obsolete) dative of sie; them (indirect object).
    • (Can we add an example for this sense?)

See also[edit]

  • er
  • ihm
  • seiner
  • ihnen

Further reading[edit]

  • ihn in Duden online

Hunsrik[edit]

Etymology[edit]

From Proto-Germanic *inǭ.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /iːn/

Pronoun[edit]

ihn

  1. stressed accusative of er: him (direct object).
    Ich hon das kaafd fer ihn.
    I have bought it for him.
